name: Chicken Parmesan

ingredients: 4 boneless chicken breasts, pounded to 1/2 inch thickness

directions: Whisk together the egg and milk.
Dip the chicken breasts in milk and egg mixture and then in bread crumbs.
In a skillet with a little olive oil over medium-high heat, brown on both sides until golden.
Set chicken in a baking dish.
Slice 8 pieces of mozzarella cheese and put two on each chicken breast.
Pour 1 jar of your favorite spaghetti sauce over all.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and a little more mozzarella and bake at 350Â°F for about 25 to 30 minutes, or until bubbly.
Serve with spaghetti, garlic bread and a nice green salad.
